backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, orders, and subscriptions with access‑controlled CRUD operations and ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing text‑replacement and navigation‑label update tasks with affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list summarizing key frontend files including sections, components, data, and cart logic.
frontend/index.css: CSS entry defining Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring providers and rendering all major page sections and layout components.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Account side-sheet with tabs for profile, orders, and subscriptions, plus logout and profile-saving logic.
frontend/src/components/account/ActiveSu: Displays user's active subscriptions with loading state and status badges.
frontend/src/components/account/OrderHis: Shows user's past orders with loading and empty states and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileC: Dialog prompting users to complete and save their profile before checkout.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileF: Form component that loads initial profile data and submits updated user profile fields.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginDialog: Dialog prompting users to log in via Internet Identity with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginRequir: Dialog shown when login is required, allowing Internet Identity login or cancellation.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartSheet.t: Slide‑in cart panel enabling item management and checkout, including auth and profile checks.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with branding, contact details, and a dynamic year plus external link attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Site header providing navigation triggers, cart access, and login/account actions.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Mobil: Mobile slide‑in menu listing navigation anchors and supporting smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product display card with image fallback and authenticated add‑to‑cart handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Categor: Category grid linking to page sections with smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image and CTA button that scrolls to categories.
frontend/src/components/sections/ReadyTo: Section rendering Ready‑to‑Cook items using ProductCard components.
frontend/src/components/sections/SaladSe: Displays a single salad product with image fallback and allows adding it to the cart via auth-gated action.
frontend/src/components/sections/Subscri: Renders subscription plan cards with add-to-cart and WhatsApp-based subscription actions, gated by authentication.
frontend/src/components/sections/Vegetab: Shows a grid of vegetable ProductCards and a notice about fluctuating market prices.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Provides a floating WhatsApp button that opens a predefined chat link.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and exports an array of vegetable product data.
frontend/src/data/subscriptions.ts: Defines SubscriptionPlan and provides a list of predefined subscription plans.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGateProvi: Implements auth-gated action execution with a login-required dialog using Internet Identity.
Clears cached auth‑related queries and resets the QueryClient.
frontend/src/features/auth/useAuthGate.t: Hook that exposes the AuthGate context and enforces provider usage.
Provides cart state with add, remove, quantity update, and persistence via localStorage.
frontend/src/features/cart/cartStorage.t: Loads and saves cart items to localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/features/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines CartItem and CartState interfaces for cart structure.
frontend/src/features/cart/useCart.ts: Hook that returns the cart context and ensures provider usage.
frontend/src/features/orders/orderMutati: Provides mutations for adding orders and subscriptions and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/features/orders/orderQuerie: Query hooks for retrieving order history and active subscriptions using the actor API.
frontend/src/features/profile/profileQue: Query and mutation hooks for getting and updating user profile and delivery address.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom utility shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/unsplashSource.ts: Exports a static fallback image URL and deprecated helper functions returning the same URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, clearing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappCheckout.ts: Builds a WhatsApp deep-link URL containing a formatted order summary using cart items and user profile data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, and the request to replace all 'Ready to Cut' text with 'Ready to Cook' across the site.
